name: Customers Without Any Sales Transactions
query:
SELECT
    `tabCustomer`.name as "Customer Id:Link/Customer:120",
    `tabCustomer`.customer_name as "Customer Name::120",
    `tabCustomer`.territory as "Territory:Link/Territory:120",
    `tabCustomer`.customer_group as "Customer Group:Link/Customer Group:120"
FROM
    `tabCustomer` 
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice` ON `tabCustomer`.name = `tabSales Invoice`.customer 
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Order` ON `tabCustomer`.name = `tabSales Order`.customer
WHERE
    ( `tabSales Invoice`.customer IS NULL OR `tabSales Invoice`.docstatus != 1 ) AND (`tabSales Order`.customer IS NULL OR `tabSales Order`.docstatus != 1 )
